list.description:
#scorpion #m56 #m56scorpion
SB sight for M56 Scorpion. For each round (AP, APCR, HEAT) are separate sight file.

Прицел для Т-64А, Быстрая стрельба на большую дальность без ее измерения с высокой точностью.
Этот прицел позволяет с первого выстрела определить дальность и поразить цель даже только по высунутой башне.
В прицеле присутствует минимальное количество мешающих объектов (линий), даже риски дальности убраны к минимуму.
Первые две кривые которые ближе всего к вертикальной центральной линии прицела используются для определения дальности по ширине башне и корпуса без гусениц для большинства танков противника. Две дальние от центра кривые отвечают за определение дальности по длине корпуса (то есть е

SB sight for Tiger II H

#KTH #Tiger_II_H #tiger_ii

Edit:
v2- slight change font size

SB sight for Tiger II P

#KTP #Tiger_II_P #tiger_ii

#Ferdinand
SB user sight for Ferdinand's PzGr 39/43 rounds.

Прицел для Maus и E-100 для Симуляторных боев. Так же прицел подходит к Jagdtiger, ибо пушка на мышь ставилась с него и для того, чтобы не делать новый прицел подлые фашисты поставили в мышу старый прицел, и установили его на то же место, относительно к стволу. Описание к прицелу и инструкция к использованию на скриншотах. Расстояние для стрельбы с этого прицела 5 - 2800 метров.
Я бы мог сделать, и сделал бы параболу для мелкого калибра, но эти две параболы бы пересекались, и было бы ничего не понятно.
Очень важно! Прицельная сетка рассчитана исключительно под основной снаряд (PzGr 43)!
_____

fast made.
Edit:
SB fight mode sight.
sight was made for tank T44's BR-365A shells

#T44

У тебя специфичные вкусы? Ты водитель мышиных войск? Ты любишь выбивать врагам с мелкого калибра гусеницы и стволы, а то и уничтожать целиком какие нибудь объекты 120? Тогда этот прицел для тебя.
Прицел для Maus'a и E-100, есть основная баллистическая сетка, которая минимизирована, но функционал не потеряла. И есть прицельная сетка с баллистической параболой для мелкой пушки. При сочетании параболы и прицельной сетки получаем очень точный прицел для второй пушки. При выстрелах на расстояние до 700-800 м. попадание гарантировано точно в место прицеливания, с 1000 до 1400 м. попадание уже не точ
Another fictional sight, I use this one on my german tanks. but works for all. not much else to say.... #sight #tanks #alltanks # fictional #germany

file.name: fictional sight v2 (I use for germans).zip

list.description:
Two sights for single mounted 20mm Flak 38's
#flak38 #flakpanzer_1 #flakpanzeri #gepard #flakpanzer38t
Note that while the file is called flakpanzer_1_(GT/AA) you can paste them in other sight maps as well

The first sight were used on flak 38's specially meant for ground combat in the early years.

The second sight came later, more intended for AA as far as I know.

A third sight (which I didn't make is the telescopic sight) as I have no idea how that one looks.

Setting up custom sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Main → Tank battle settings.
2)In the he

A modern(ish) kinda fictional sight I made for all tanks in game. I tried to keep it as clean as possible so you can actually see what your shooting at clearly. max range is 2000m (from lack of engagements farther than that) 400m intervals. Enjoy! #alltanks #sight #tanks #modern

Fictional AA sight. Its my first sight but I am still proud of it, in order to change the texts go and find text:t="40mm bofors HE = 874m/s" and simply change the words. Should work with all relatively low zoom aa sights. ENJOY! #sight #aa #fictional

Sturmpanzer II Brumbar - Super MOD "invisible force"
https://youtu.be/vJsIAG9Kxek
https://youtu.be/TSMX4rMYGLs

A simple crosshair used on the 37mm #flak36 #sdkfz_6_2_flak36

Keybind crosshair lightening if you want your crosshair in red as shown in the screenshots

Setting up custom sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Main → Tank battle settings.
2)In the heading “Use alternative sight grid”, select “Add a grid sight”.
3)In the UserSights folder in the game directory, a folder will be created with the name of the selected vehicle and a BLK file (sight_1),
which is an example of a standard sight.
4)Without exiting the game, copy the user-made sight into the created

semi-realistic iron and telescopic sights (M64) for 37mm AA gun on US halftrack M15
полуреалистичные визирни и телескопически прицел (M64) для зенитнней пушки 37 мм на US halftrack M15
_____________________________________________________________________________________
4 sights:
1. Iron sights (front/rear) (IRL dimensions not known, made by random)
circles diameter dimensions in mil: 10/100/200, rear sight circle 15 mil.
when elevation change front sights move up while rear stay on place.

2. M64 telescopic sights "arcade" elevation lines reflect actual ammo loaded HEFIT on left, AP, AP/HEFIT

Sight for the #m16 #m16_mgmc and #m13 #m13mgmc based on the reticle in heroes and generals. The rings have pretty much no leading purposes for fast flying aircraft.

requested by reddit user /u/jimopl

Setting up custom sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Main → Tank battle settings.
2)In the heading “Use alternative sight grid”, select “Add a grid sight”.
3)In the UserSights folder in the game directory, a folder will be created with the name of the selected vehicle and a BLK file (sight_1),
which is an example of a standard sight.
4)Without exiting the g

First version of an ironsight based on the ingame model of the #flakpanzer_iv #flakpanzer_iv_wirbelwind #wirbelwind

The middle dot is slightly off center to match the velocity of the HVAP belt.

The outer ring is less thick compared to the ingame model for a better visibility. I can make it thicker(in a seperate version) if people prefer that instead.

More #spaa sights coming in the future.

Setting up the sights

1)Take the vehicle for a Test Drive, then go to game settings → Main → Tank battle settings.
2)In the heading “Use alternative sight grid”, select “Add a grid sight”.
3)In the Use

#tu_14t #usersight
Прицел для самолёта Ту-14т
Sight for Tu-14t

#type_60_atm
#type60atm
**The sight only works if the gunner is still alive**

This is an unhistorical sight to improve gameplay experiences for CQC encounters
-The sight distances are meant for relatively flat ground.
-The sight lines are meant for a relative flightpath for "X" distance.

Contains a:
-200m line
-500m line
-600+m line(the very same line as 200m)
-a last ditch CQC 60m circle. (third person shooting is needed for a shorter minimum range)

Apologies for my inability to think of a more exciting name.
This sight is similar to my 'range finding sight', I've removed the actual range finding bit and added text distance displays for numerous types of shells.

Currently I have a few examples of sights I've created myself, but I've made this sight with the intention that those interested can easily adapt it to their own needs. This makes the sight compatible for any tank(s) you might wish, with only some very simple steps to make it so.
It requires a bit of editing of the file, but I've explained it and layed it out in such a way that

Historical Chieftain sight - Tank Laser Sight (TLS) No. 1 Mk 1

Was used as an alternative, then complete replacement for the ranging MG.

Differing sources as to which marks had this sight, Mk.5/L appears to be the starting point:
Mk.5/L: https://forum.warthunder.com/index.php?/topic/333808-chieftain-mk54-mbt-new-top-tier-uk-tank/&do=findComment&comment=6638033
Mk.6/L (also known as Mk.2 (Y)/L): http://norfolktankmuseum.co.uk/chieftain-mbt-mk-23-fv4201/

Features static ranging markers for both APDS and HESH ammunition (not specifically APDSFS).

Document source: https://www.scribd.com/doc/16

M60A1 RISE (Passive-ERA) 'Patton' UNHISTORICAL sight based off of a leopard 1 one
I modified this one to be used with the M60 Rise
https://live.warthunder.com/post/673976/en/
who modified this one:

Historical sight for AMX-13-75 and AMX-13-75 SS.11 light tanks, made according to diagram from APG test report. Range scales are in hundreds of meters and tailored for AP rounds, lead dashes and gaps are 5-mil per test report data.

Be advised, this reticle is not suitable for AMX-13-90 and AMX-13 with FL-11 turret.

#usersight #gunsight #realism #AMX-13

semi realistic / полуреалистичный
зенитный прицел обр. 1938 г. для ГАЗ ДШК 1938.

Frontal AA iron sights Obr. 1938 for gaz DShK 1938
(which is even modeled on vehicle)
(based on Sick2day japan SPAAG sights https://live.warthunder.com/post/677359/en/)

semirealistic coz:
1: Its iron sights and it is not possible to make em fully functional as in real.
2: Its not possible to make circles for targets w speed 400 and 500km due to limited ingame FOV !

dimensions are:
central circle diameter 10 mils (12 on outer edge)
next circles diameters: 45/90/135/180 mils

2 versions: more realistic, and with

This is a Warhammer 40k themed sight, depicting the Eye of Horus. The point of aim is the tip of the pointed 'pupil', you can see the set distance on the left and the measured distance on the right.
This obviously isn't a useful or even remotely historical sight, but a fun one.

It is however compatible with all tanks, just drop into the relevant tank's folder.

Warhammer // 40k // unhistorical // fun
